name: Ron DeSantis
title: Governor of Florida
summary: Ron DeSantis has a direct speaking style with a subtle Florida accent, using concise statements and occasionally stern delivery when discussing policy positions.
bio: Ronald Dion DeSantis is an American politician serving as the 46th governor of Florida since 2019. A member of the Republican Party, he previously represented Florida's 6th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 2013 to 2018.
voiceCharacteristics: Tendency to emphasize key policy points

samples.title: Florida Leadership
samples.fullText: In Florida, we choose freedom over Faucism. We're not going to let anyone lock you down, we will not let anyone take your jobs, and we will not let anyone close your schools.
tips: Pay attention to the emphasis on key words like 'freedom' and 'not'
